title: OrchestratorCommand
description: Command for Workflow Orchestrator; The standard payload sent to the Workflow Orchestrator to initiate or advance a workflow.

CchMessage.title: CCH Message
CchMessage.description: A standardized message object for reporting errors, warnings, or info.

messageId.description: A unique UUID for this specific message instance.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the message was generated.

level.description: The severity level of the message.

code.description: A machine-readable code for the specific message.

summary.description: A user-friendly, potentially localizable summary for display on a dashboard.
summary.example: An TCCI invoice not found for invoice nbr 123123

context.description: A flexible object containing key-value pairs of relevant business context for the message.

sourceEvent.description: OPTIONAL: Provides traceability to the original external event that triggered this chain of actions. Primarily relevant for the initial command of type 'EVENT'.

eventType.description: The type of the original business event (e.g., 'shipment-created').

eventId.description: The unique ID of the original source event.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the original source event occurred.

eventDataURI.description: A URI pointing to the full payload of the original source event, typically in S3.

status.description: The final status of the capability's execution.

payload.description: The data payload from the capability. Can contain any properties for a SUCCESS status. Must contain a 'messages' array for an ERROR status.

routingHint.description: OPTIONAL: Provides info to route this command to a specific parallel branch within a workflow.

branchKey.description: The unique key identifying the parallel branch to target (e.g., a filingPackId).

messages.description: A required list of messages when the status is ERROR.
